DOC.brief_summary: This first-in-human study ILS-920 . This study provide initial assessment safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , pharmacodynamics ( PD ) ILS-920 administration ascend single intravenous ( IV ) dose healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Single Ascending Doses Of ILS-920
